701494f.title: Bronx: Morris Park Avenue - Williamsbridge Road
701494f.text:
Morris Park Ave., west from Williamsbridge Road, showing workmen
laying out trolley line tracks on the part of the thoroughfare that
extends to Bronxdale Ave. The awenue, between the aforementioned two
points was cut through the former Morris Park Race Track in connection
with its sale by Joseph P. Day and J. Clarence Davies in the summer of
1913. For additional data see the ''New York Times'' of April 27, June 15,
and June 22, 1913.
Spring 1913.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
